item.title: How to use temporary email address
item.description: All of the websites need to submit emails nowadays. But when ever we submit the email address to any website from the next day onwards we will start getting spam Mails from the registered application. Trying to solve this by two easy hacks Use Temporary emails Link to heading There are some websites which allow us to get temporary email address and its inbox for a short span of time. FOr registering and testing we can use the email address and its inbox to see the mails received
